acf-fields-flexible_content-layout_title.name: acf/fields/flexible_content/layout_title/key={$field_key}
acf-fields-flexible_content-layout_title.summary: Customize the text (HTML) displayed at the top of each flexible content layout. Filter for a specific field based on it’s key.
acf-fields-flexible_content-layout_title.description: This filter allows you to modify the text (HTML) displayed at the top of each flexible content layout. All sub field functions are available within this filter to load and display values. This filter is also run via AJAX when the layout is toggled open or closed.

acf-fields-flexible_content-layout_title.name: acf/fields/flexible_content/layout_title/name={$field_name}
acf-fields-flexible_content-layout_title.summary: Customize the text (HTML) displayed at the top of each flexible content layout. Filter for a specific field based on it’s name.
acf-fields-flexible_content-layout_title.description: This filter allows you to modify the text (HTML) displayed at the top of each flexible content layout. All sub field functions are available within this filter to load and display values. This filter is also run via AJAX when the layout is toggled open or closed.

acf-fields-flexible_content-layout_title.name: acf/fields/flexible_content/layout_title
acf-fields-flexible_content-layout_title.summary: Customize the text (HTML) displayed at the top of each flexible content layout. Filter for every field.
acf-fields-flexible_content-layout_title.description: This filter allows you to modify the text (HTML) displayed at the top of each flexible content layout. All sub field functions are available within this filter to load and display values. This filter is also run via AJAX when the layout is toggled open or closed.
